div.p: Group 1 Mapping from Issue Severityversion: 5.0.0) to Issue Severityversion: 5.0.0)

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet R5-issue-severity-for-R4 from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/issue-severity|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
